title: Index of Factory Payrolls-Slaughtering and Meat Packing for United States
notes:
Source: For 1919-1930 Data, See Bureau Of Labor Statistics Bulletin 610 Pp.75-76, 105; For 1931-1934 Data, Bureau Of Labor Statistics Mimeogrophed Release Of September, 1938, "Revised Index Numbers Of Factory Employment And Payrolls"; For 1935-1939 Data, Bureau Of Labor Statistics Mimeographed Release, May, 1940; For 1940-1941 Data, Bureau Of Labor Statistics "Employment And Payrolls"; Thereafter Monthly Labor Review.

This NBER data series m08111 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: m08111
